title: SoulViaSound M-Bundle WAV BATTERY MASCHiNE - SYNTHiC4TE [deepsta
description:
SoulViaSound M-Bundle WAV BATTERY MASCHiNE










Azalera is a new unconventional drum library designed for Maschine and Battery 3 owners. The sounds are recorded with some different types of microphones like contact microphone through an Ampeg amplifier or a stethoscope that feed an electret microphone. After recording, each sample was post produced and in the end, tuned in MASCHINE 1.7 and Battery 3. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll find some nice unconventional percussion, metal, glass, drill, crackle, blip & blop and zap sounds. This library contain:

10 Drum Kits for MASCHINE 1.7 and Battery 3
over 450 samples 24bit/44.1Khz

This sound pack can be used used in MASCHINE 1.7 and Battery 3 or you can use the samples in your favourite drum maschine. If you donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know about MASCHINE and never have had the chance of playing it, you should consider testing it or watch the videos on NI web site because it has a really nice work flow. Kontakt and MASCHINE are powerful ITB music production tools.

Pathfinder is a post produced vinyl drum kit with additional scratch banks, designed for Maschine and Battery 3 owners. Berlin has a large market of second hand vinyls, so we bought some different unreleased radio promotion discs from 80Ã¢â‚¬Â²s Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 90Ã¢â‚¬Â²s and sampled through a hand made class-a RIAA preamplifier and an 2 x API 7600 Channel Strip into Pro Tools. The kits are prepared for Maschine and Battery. For Maschine the scratches banks are mapped for keyboard like a normal Maschine instrument. The audio demos are made with Pathfinder and REDD (only where you hear synths) into Maschine, without extra processing. This library contains:

10 drum kits
4 Scratch Banks (49 keys for every bank)
400 samples (24/44)

You can use it for styles like Hip Hop, Dubstep, Pop, Electro or some crazy retro modern combinations. If you donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know about MASCHINE, you should consider testing it or watch the videos on NI web site

REDD (Maschine version) is a sound pack for Maschine owners. It is a sound pack resampled from the REDD (Kontakt version) and tuned in MASCHINE 1.6. In this library you will find some aggressive fat bass, aggressive lead and soft pad instruments. Some pads instruments are processed with Absynth 5 FX, so youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll need to have Absynth to use them. The audio demos are made with REDD (Maschine version) and Anamorphic without extra processing, mixing or mastering. This sound pack contains:

30 instruments
over 700MB samples

This sound pack can be used for a large range of music styles like Trance, Dance, RÃ¢â‚¬â„¢nÃ¢â‚¬â„¢B, Electro and much more. If you donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know about MASCHINE and never have had the chance of playing it, you should consider testing it or watch the videos on NI web site

Azalera is a new unconventional drum library designed for Maschine and Battery 3 owners. The sounds are recorded with some different types of microphones like contact microphone through an Ampeg amplifier or a stethoscope that feed an electret microphone. After recording, each sample was post produced and in the end, tuned in MASCHINE 1.7 and Battery 3. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll find some nice unconventional percussion, metal, glass, drill, crackle, blip & blop and zap sounds. This library contain:

over 450 samples 24bit/44.1Khz

This sound pack can be used used in MASCHINE 1.7 and Battery 3 or you can use the samples in your favourite drum maschine. If you donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know about MASCHINE and never have had the chance of playing it, you should consider testing it or watch the videos on NI web site because it has a really nice work flow. Kontakt and MASCHINE are powerful ITB music production tools.



In this bundle you will find Maschine and Battery formats. Anamorphic, Pathfinder, REDD and Azalera in Maschine format. Anamorphic,Pathfinder and Azalera in Battery 3 format.
